title: Riot send me here
body: I just logged in on my acc and all my friends list disapere all about friends, i have recommended friends to add via my facebook. So can someone help me ?

replies.body: That's a strange issue to hear your friends list is gone.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a deeper look into this.  We'll respond asap!
